name: LOS TACOS No.1
address: 136 Church St, New York, NY 10007, USA

reviews.text: Became my comfort food ğŸ˜

Definitivamente unos buenos tacos con sabor a casa!
El costo me pareciÃ³ elevado. Pero no excesivo.
Las salsas estÃ¡n de poca madre, y tienen limÃ³n verde!
Tienen buen personal y cada quiÃ©n sabe hacer su chamba, pero el taquero es grosero y eso no gusta.
La prÃ³xima vez me asegurarÃ© de formarme en la fila de otro taquero para que toda la experiencia sea 5/5!
Best tacos in NYC

Pretty good, I'd probably give this 3.5 stars if i could.
Pros: adobada pork is the winner here, it's very good and worth returning just for that alone.  All the food is clearly fresh and made with intent. Good side bar avail with extra toppings
Cons: cost is too high for what you get.  i like a bit of crumbled mexican cheese on my tacos which is not standard here. No beer. No bathrooms. Guac is too blended into a goo for my taste.  And the steak and cactus tacos are totally forgettable.... mostly bland.
Fantastic food. Can't wait to be back on nyc to do it all again.
Delicioso!!! Autenticos tacos mexicanosâ€¦ el sabor muy rico y aunque estaba lleno, la atencion muy buenaâ€¦ super alegres y amables

I was shocked by how good the adobada, guacamole, and fresh salas were (I would say you can akip the pollo asado and maybe even the care asada though they are good too). Ive heard so many negative things about the Mexican food in NYC. Im so glad I had an excellent experience ğŸ˜‹.

The restaurant was abaolutely spotless and the staff was all excellent too. I hope to come back sometime.
Amazing as always
Brilliant! Loved it.

BEST TACOS Iâ€™VE EVER HAD. if youâ€™re visiting New York City, this place itâ€™s a must try!! everything is so good, starting with the staff and the tacos are freshly made with handmade tortillas. The workers definitely deserve a rise because theyâ€™re doing an AMAZING job!!!
Simply amazing tacos. Don't sleep on this spot
By far my favourite go to for delicious  tacos...etc  in NYC , freshly made with fresh ingredients .
great

Never thought fast food could be so delicious!
This is part of a chain of fast Mexican food places.
Service is super fast and friendly.
They are always busy but still get your order right and with a smile!
Food is made right in front of you and is simply delicious!
Must hit taco spot

AMAZING tacos!! Was recommended by a friend and thought it would be overrated because I hear about it all the time but tried it on my trip to NYC and it was probably the best chicken taco Iâ€™ve ever had.
They made everything so simple.

The best tacos in the New York area if you have had tacos and are not sure if the flavor is authentic to mexican taste i highly recommend you to stop here and enjoy authentic mexican tacos with great flavors chiles toreados salsa Verde and salsa roja.
Amazing Food, quick service
Great food and quick service.
No vegetarian breakfast burrito available

Los mejores tacos y quesadillas que comimos en Nueva York.
Local limpio, personal amable y atento y comida espectacular.
Poca mÃ¡s que aÃ±adir.
Volveremos sin duda en nuestro prÃ³ximo viaje.
Amazing food!!!! Alexander V. nos trato brutal y estuvo muy pendiente a nosotros. VolverÃ­a de seguroğŸ’¯
Just to small for me excellent  everything else !!

Iâ€™ve been wanting to try them till today
They werenâ€™t wrong about how good and tasty
Price is worth it fr
This is for sure my fav no1 spot for tacos
Los Tacos was our best meal of the trip. The adobada pork quesadilla may be the best Mexican food we have ever had and I am from AZ and eat a lot of Mexican food. This restaurant makes me like NYC.

the chain is probably one of the most authentic tacos iâ€™ve tasted here in nyc, however the price point is horrendous ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«, itâ€™s around $6.50 for ONE taco after tax and if youâ€™re a broke college student like me, thatâ€™s not exactly the best deal. iâ€™ve never been to los tacos before so if youâ€™ve never been there before, keep in mind u get ur ticket â€”> give it to one of the preparers/chefsâ€”> they ask you if you want a corn or flour tortilla and what toppings u want â€”> wait until they hand you yours! it was also a pretty chaotic environment. overall, i would say theyâ€™re GREAT tacos, however there is definitely cheaper options in the city
The tacos here are delicious.
Best taco Iâ€™ve ever had, would travel back to new york just for their tacos.

Wow, what a flavor explosion. Had the pollo and adabado tacos with the works. So fresh, made right in front of you, and old school Coke in bottles. YUM! Get in cashier line, take receipt to grill line, and hand it in. Boom, and momentarily you'll have a  fiesta in your mouth!
Burrito and empanada of adobada. Simply delicious !!
Great food and service. My favorite was the pork tacos. It gets a little busy but the food is worth it!

Ganz nett fÃ¼r einen schnellen Snack zwischendurch. Das Personal ist freundlich und tatsÃ¤chlich wird sehr effizient gearbeitet. Erst bestellt man an der Kasse und gibt dann seinen Zettel weiter an die zahlreichen Mitarbeiter hinter der Theke, die einem dann schnell den bestellten in meinem Fall eine HÃ¼hnchen Quesadilla fertig machen.
Geschmacklich war es sehr lecker. Aber schon nicht gÃ¼nstig fÃ¼r so einen Mini Snack auf die Hand. Kann man dennoch weiter empfehlen.
Ik heb hier voor het eerst in mijn leven taco's gegeten, en ik ben zo blij dat dit mijn eerste keer was. Dit zal me altijd bijblijven als de eerste en de laatste keer.
Most delicious carne asada tacos Iâ€™ve ever had! Great soda too!
Los mejores tacos de NY, personal muy eficiente y el mejor sabor. Recomiendo pedirlos con tortilla de harina!

Best tacos in town! Great people serving, you can feel their joy. I highly recommend the cactus!! Itâ€™s fast food, so asking for atmosphere is not fair ;-)

Ricos tacos, muy autÃ³ctono, al ser los tacos comida de paso o â€œrÃ¡pidaâ€, no esperen un menÃº con variedad de platos, es sencillo pero con rico sabor. Suele tener bastante gente, pero el que estÃ¡ cerca de Wall Street estaba super bien, nos atendieron rÃ¡pido.

This was absolutely amazing. We were craving Mexican, and this place delivered. Excellent service, delicious food, amazing horchata. Line moved very fast, we waited less than 5 minutes for our food. 10/10 would recommend!

Great authentic flavor! If you haven't tried the nopales (specially as a vegan option), this is a great place to do so :)
Must try the tamarind fresh water!
Quick service too!
The best tacos in NYC period!
2 tacos. Food was good. Salsa was flavorful
Wonderful tasty tacos, it is very worth it.
Unreal scran
My absolute FAVORITE!!!!!!! So so so so good
Quesadilla steak was fantastic. My favorite!!!!
Truly happy with how things went. I liked it here.
Tacos ğŸŒ® were delicious ğŸ˜‹â€¦

We ordered tacos, a tostada, and chips and guac. Food was delicious. Everything was fresh. Well flavored meat (we had asada). Guacamole was creamy and super good. A nice salsa selection at the salsa bar. Service was amazing especially for how busy they are. Food comes quickly and the staff is welcoming and friendly.
This is one of our favorite stops in NYC! The food is exceptional and we have not had one bad experience. The best taco is the pork one but you canâ€™t go wrong with any of their selections.

Los tacos estaban bien ricos! Eran de carne asada, los pedi con tortilla de harina y maiz, les recomiendo mas la de maiz. La salsa roja esta bien picosa pero muy rica! Hay mucha gente pero si despachan muy rapido. No hay donde sentarse pero si hay mesas donde se puede recargar uno para comer.

5 Stars ğŸŒŸ must visit if in NYC, they have many locations to choose from.

Great food, great people, fantastic location.
Absolutely worth the wait.
Tacos prepared fresh in front of you.
Chicken, Beef, Cactus.
Flour or Corn options.

Five Stars, will return for sure.

( chorizo )breakfast burritos they sell on a cart outside the place, $6 or $7 i forgot but no tax and its filling and delicious. They have 3 options i tried the veggie and the chorizo, will get bacon next time. The sauce it comes with is spicy and smoky.

Corn tacos is my usual choice of tortilla and their quesdilla is alright not as cheesy as I hoped but very delicious ice horchata, very clean space and spicy sauce.

One of the best taco places in the city. Been here twice and left satisfied both times. My favorite is the pork taco, but the beef and chicken are good as well.  Check it out if you are in the area. FYI, there is no indoor seating.

LOS TACOS No.1 serves authentic and flavorful tacos, and I tried the pollo asado (chicken), adobada (pork), and carne asada (beef) â€” all were excellent. A big plus for me is that they offer wheat flour tortillas, which is great if youâ€™re not a fan of corn tortillas.

The staff are friendly, though service is minimal, as the spot is more about quick, casual dining. The atmosphere is simple and lively, perfect for a quick bite in the area.

Abbiamo voluto provare questo ristorante attirati dai prezzi esposti e dalla quantitÃ  di gente che mangiava di gusto allâ€™interno. I cibi sono preparati con ingredienti freschissimi e molto saporiti, il personale molto gentile che ti spiega qualsiasi cosa tu non capisca. Ottimi prezzi. Unico neo le porzioni abbastanza ridotte (tacos e quesadillas). Altamente consigliato!
The service is fast, the tacos were great, and the tortillas were freshly made â€¦ will definitely be thinking about these again. Highly recommend!

Was in the area for work and figured why not! Well I was pleasantly surprised that although the line was really longâ€¦.the wait wasnâ€™t. I had the chicken tacos which were very tasty. The food was fresh, quickly prepared and did not disappoint. Stop in for a quick bite to eat. Just a side note.. there are no tables just high tables to stand and eat at.

Did a day of biking then headed to Los Tacos No. 1 on Church street.. I ordered the Carne Asada Tostada and the Pollo Asado tacos! The service was so quick, very helpful staff and speedy. I also got a plate of grilled onions and jalapeÃ±os, quac and chips as well as a horchata!! Piere Z. was very helpful putting in my order and making sure it came out perfect. They had a great salsa bar with many choices to pick from.. Was soooo fresh and tasty. Will be back for sure.. good eating!!

I canâ€™t get enough of los tacos, what an amazing meal, the tacos on the plate with pulled pork and nopal was supreme. Their Mexican Coca Cola just added to the magic. This place should deserves their 5 star rating. On top of it all, staff was so friendly and nice

Una cadena de tacos muy recomendable en Nueva York, tienen gran variedad y buenos precios. PodrÃ¡s ver como cocinan los tacos en su cocina abierta. TambiÃ©n tienen quesadillas, te recomiendo pedir la quesadilla especial que es una autÃ©ntica delicia. Come a buen precio, ademÃ¡s no tendrÃ¡s que esperar mucho.
Good tacos priced decently. Loved the steak in the taco. Pulled pork was nice too. Guac and chips on the side were good. Overall highly recommended!

Los Tacos No. 1 ğŸŒ® en NY son mis favoritos, Â¡no hay otros mejores! ğŸ”¥ğŸ¤¤ El sabor autÃ©ntico mexicano es brutal ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡½ğŸ’¯. The tortillas, the meat, the salsaâ€”todo estÃ¡ on point ğŸ‘Œ. Y el servicio siempre es de primera, rÃ¡pido y amable ğŸ™Œ. Always worth the wait. Â¡Un must si visitas NYC! ğŸ—½â¤ï¸

When I was searching Tik Tok for places to eat on my visit to New York, Los Tacos came up multiple times. Me being from California and me nominating them as best place for tacos I wasnâ€™t looking to add this to my places to stop. After getting off the train and heading back to the hotel, there it wasâ€¦ on the corner with a little line, but not too long. I took that as a sign to try it out. It was a small setting with no seats, just standing room and chest height tables to eat. You could the workers in the back making fresh tortillas and cooking meat. I ordered one steak and one chicken taco but asked not to include the guacamole since Iâ€™m allergic. Off to the side thereâ€™s options for other salsas , and toppings. I must say I was throughly pleased with my choice of stopping in. Food was fresh meat was tender and seasoned salsa was hotter than expected , maybe ask to get it on the side if you donâ€™t like hotâ€¦other than that 10/10.

The service was fantastic! Such kind and accommodative staff. I had my luggage as I just flew in and a staff member saw me struggling with my plates and offered to help immediately. I asked what was spicy in the taco just out of curiosity as I didnâ€™t expect it. The lovely staff member Emilly immediately offered to make me two new tacos without the salsa as that was what was spicy. BEST TACOS EVER and ever better service!

We came from Chicago and had to visit this spot! 100% worth the hype and recommendations. We had to wait in a line outside before we can get online inside but it moves pretty fast. We absolutely loved the tacos and the atmosphere was whole vibe itself. There is limited eating space but people quickly eat and leave. I highly recommend this spot and would come back!

The absolute best tacos I've tried in NYC,I tae the tacos so forgot to take picture its low key pricey but we'll worth it fresh hand made tortillas fresh guacamole fresh meat.The real Authentic taste of Tacos..workers have the best attitude very welcoming.

Su comida es muy buena, los tacos van desde los $5 a los $10 si ni me equivoco, es para comer parado, pero todo pasa muy rÃ¡pido, es agradable y una experiencia algo diferente a los que estamos acostumbrados por lo menos en mi paÃ­s RD, por el sabor vale mucho la pena probarlos ğŸ‘ğŸ½

Les meilleurs tacos que nous avons jamais mangÃ©s ! Ã€ faire absolument Ã  New York. Les tacos sont faits minutÃ©s avec des produits frais et savoureux. Il y a un petit peu dâ€™attente mais le service est trÃ¨s rapide. Il y a des tables hautes sur lesquelles les tacos peuvent Ãªtre dÃ©gustÃ©s, sinon prendre Ã  emporter. Le guacamole est incroyable !

Honestly SO delicious best tacos Iâ€™ve ever had, wish they had birria. They donâ€™t have seating but thereâ€™s a couple of tables and places to stand and eat and a self serve sauce station.  muy ricooooos . My favorite were the carne asada. I tried carne asada, pollo asado, and adobada which is basically al pastor. All of them 10/10 and very filling.

An Unforgettable Taco Experience at Los Tacos No. 1!

I had an incredible experience at Los Tacos No. 1 during my trip to New York. The food was absolutely amazingâ€”easily some of the best tacos Iâ€™ve ever had. But what truly set this place apart was the staff. Not only were they incredibly friendly, but they were genuinely happy to be there.

In a city that can sometimes feel rushed and impersonal, the energy at Los Tacos No. 1 was a breath of fresh air. It was clear that the staff took pride in what they were doing, and that kind of positivity is contagious. My hats off to the entire team and especially the manager for maintaining such a high standardâ€”not just in the food, but in the overall experience.

If youâ€™re in NYC and looking for delicious tacos served with a side of great vibes, do yourself a favor and stop by. Iâ€™ll definitely be coming back next time Iâ€™m in town!

Une cuisine incroyable avec des aliments frais et savoureux. Des sauces piquantes trÃ¨s goÃ»teuses Ã  rajouter soi-mÃªme en libre service.
Une carte de qualitÃ© et un super service.

Notre coup de cÅ“ur nourriture sur New York, c'est une adresse Ã  ne pas manquer!

Had a great experience at this cozy Mexican restaurant in Tribeca. I ordered the pollo asado taco along with some chips and salsa, and washed it down with a Sidral Mundet Green Apple soda. The food was absolutely delicious â€” the chicken was juicy, well-seasoned, and packed with flavor. The chips were fresh and crispy, and the salsa had the perfect balance of heat and freshness. Solid 5 out of 5 for the food.

The service was just as impressive. Staff were friendly, quick, and made me feel genuinely welcome without rushing me. Another easy 5 out of 5.

The only slight knock was the atmosphere â€” it was clean and casual, but nothing particularly memorable or stylish. Iâ€™d rate the vibe a 3 out of 5.

Still, the food and service more than made up for it. Definitely a spot Iâ€™ll be coming back to whenever Iâ€™m craving great tacos in Tribeca.

We got the adobada at Los Tacos No. 1 and it did not disappoint. Juicy, flavorful, and packed with that perfect grilled pork, there was some crunchy charred part and that made it extra good. Definitely something you want to eat right away, the meat is so juicy it can soak through the corn or flour tortilla if you wait too long.

Probably not first-date food unless you want to impress them with your skills in slurping taco juices and trying to finish it all in one bite. It's that good.

They provide lime and salsas on the side if you want to add a little extra flavor or texture. I went with some lime and pico de gallo, and it hit the spot.
Definitivamente los mejores tacos que he comido fuera de MÃ©xico. Tienen trompo y lo tÃ­pico de cualquier taquerÃ­a, hasta una salsa que â€œsi picaâ€. SÃºper recomendados.
everything we tried was absolutely exceptional! best tacos in the city. service was quick and friendly and loved that they had accessible sauces and toppings! 12/10
Sehr leckere Tacos. Frisch und schnell zubereitet mit einer mexikanischen WÃ¼rzung. FÃ¼r jeden der es etwas schÃ¤rfer mag ist der Saucenstand zu empfehlen.
We liked the tacos and didnâ€™t have to wait for a long time. However the sauces were too spicy for our taste.

I stopped by Los Tacos on Church Street yesterday and had a great experience! The food was fresh, flavorful, and made with care. The tacos were packed with delicious ingredients and had that perfect balance of spice and texture.

The staff was friendly and welcoming, and the service was quick even during the busy lunch rush. You can tell they take pride in what they do. Iâ€™ll definitely be coming back soonâ€”highly recommend if youâ€™re in the area and craving some real, tasty tacos!

Itâ€™s amazing.
Fast service, a lot of staff cooking and cleaning.
They donâ€™t waste time at all.

Tacos were excellent, fresh and good flavor.
I wish the tacos could be bigger portion.
Itâ€™s pricey for the portion they served.
